metadata.inclusion: To include, Touch and hold any button for more than 5 seconds. LED light blinks to indicate inclusion mode.
metadata.exclusion: To exclude, Touch and hold any button for more than 5 seconds. LED light blinks to indicate exclusion mode
metadata.reset:
To reset , press and hold first button(left top) for more than 15 seconds. LED lights turn OFF and ON to indicate rest. 

Note : Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
